summary: This document is a deposit account opening application for the Butterfly Trust with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas. It includes personal information, account types, and compliance with anti-money laundering regulations. The document highlights the responsibilities of the account holders and the bank's obligations regarding customer identification and verification.

persons.name: Butterfly Trust
persons.context: The Butterfly Trust is mentioned as the entity opening the account with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.

persons.name: Hente Owen Indyke
persons.context: Hente Owen Indyke is listed as a trustee for the Butterfly Trust.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is also mentioned as a trustee for the Butterfly Trust.

connections.description: Both individuals serve as trustees for the Butterfly Trust.

keyFacts: The document is a deposit account opening application for the Butterfly Trust.
Hente Owen Indyke and Richard Kahn are identified as trustees of the Butterfly Trust.
The application includes compliance requirements for anti-money laundering and customer identification.
The document outlines the responsibilities of account holders regarding tax obligations.
The account is associated with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
